Key Match Events: Anthony Davis led the Lakers to a 123-116 comeback win
LA Lakers managed to keep the game within reach and secured a 87-85 lead in the third quarter
The Lakers achieved their first 2-0 start to their season since the 2010-11 season
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis notched his second consecutive 30-point game with 35 points
LeBron James also facilitated a lot on Friday after dishing out eight assists matched with 21 points
Rui Hachimura put in an effort to help the starters with 14 points and seven rebounds
Miscellaneous Highlights: Austin Reaves had a huge 26-point game and should be applauded for feeding Davis the entire night
Their one-two punch combo inside the paint was a huge factor in why LA successfully defended home court
Others: The Lakers will now prepare to face the Sacramento Kings on Saturday as they hope to keep their winning steak alive
